overview.title: Introduction
overview.description: We are committed to delivering your order quickly, safely, and conveniently. Below are the main delivery terms.

deliveryTimeframes.title: 1. Delivery Timeframes
deliveryTimeframes.description: Delivery is carried out on the same day within scheduled time slots.
deliveryTimeframes.note: Delivery time depends on the day and delivery zone.

items.sameDay: Same-day delivery within fixed time slots
items.express: Express delivery (subject to availability and additional fee)

items.freeDelivery: Free delivery for orders above the minimum purchase amount
items.smallOrders: For smaller orders, delivery fees depend on the zone and time
items.note: (Final rates for Yerevan and regions are set separately)

delaysDamageLoss.title: 4. Possible Delays
delaysDamageLoss.description: In some cases, delivery may be delayed due to:
delaysDamageLoss.note: We will inform you in advance if any delays occur.
